column1: '''Quest of Erebor''' is a Text-Adventure by [[Sam Ruby]].<ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=5 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 6 (retrieved 27 November 2010)</ref> In the game, the player needs to help [[Bilbo Baggins
column2: Bilbo]] and [[Thorin and Company]] in their adventures east of the [[Anduin
column3: Great River]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/erebor.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 27 November 2010)</ref> It is part six of [[Eamon]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings (Eamon series)
column4: The Lord of the Rings]]'' series.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
